Corpse Reviver #2 Recipe
Close

Prep

Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
ounce
gin
1
ounce
Lillet
1
ounce
fresh lemon juice
1
ounce
Cointreau
1
drop
absinthe
or pastis
Directions
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; fill with ice and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Of course, there are different (though similar) recipes for the Corpse Reviver #2; visit
Kaiser Penguin
to see a taste test of several versions.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
